title: The Role of Architects Is Shifting: From Solitary Visionaries to Collective Activists
description: For a long time, architecture was understood as an essentially individual activity, dependent on the figure of a creative genius and centered on the ability to solve problems through drawing. Over time, this image began to fade. The protagonism once concentra…
